summary: This makes Sigurd an essential, respawning vendor who buys and sells only firewood.
descriptionHtml:
Name: Sigurd Firewood Vendor


------------------------------------------------------
Author: MojoDaJojo

------------------------------------------------------

0: Name / Author
1: Thanks / Credits
2: Requirements
3: Description
4: Installation / Uninstallation
5: Version History / Bug Fixes
6: Incompatibilities / Known Issues
7: Legal

------------------------------------------------------
1: Thanks/Credits

Bethesda         - For making games that someone as challenged as me can mod.

The Nexus        - For a hassle free place to upload mods.

Sigurd           - For looking like he wanted to start selling me wood.  (Huh, huh, he said wood, Beavis.)


------------------------------------------------------
2: Requirements

A legal copy of Skyrim.

The latest official patch.


------------------------------------------------------
3: Description


Q. Who the heck is Sigurd?

A. Sigurd is Belethor\'s helper in Whiterun.  He\'s the annoying guy that\'s often chopping wood, and loves to 
tell you that he doesn\'t have time to chat. (As you run by at a great distance having never addressed him once 
in your entire pixelated life.)


Q. What does this mod do?

A. It makes Sigurd an essential respawning vendor who buys and sells only firewood.


------------------------------------------------------
4: Installation / Uninstallation

Install:

Merge the data file from the mod with the one in your Skyrim folder.


Uninstall:

Remove the files that came with the mod.
An easy way to do this would be to copy, (not cut),
the files into the folder a second time, and overwrite everything.
Now hit undo.
Assuming you\'re using windows this will delete the necessary files.


------------------------------------------------------
5: Version History / Bug Fixes

.8


___

.81 Cleaned with TESV Edit and removed 1 dirty edit to Belethor.


------------------------------------------------------
6: Incompatibilities / Known Issues

I don\'t see any reason this would conflict with anything.


------------------------------------------------------
7: Legal



I don\'t care what you do with this.
author: MojoDaJojo

files.name: SigurdFireWoodVendorDotEightOne
